# MediaSource

**Introduced in version 1.1**

| Property | Type | Required | Description | Version |
| -------- | ---- | -------- | ----------- | ------- |
| **mimeType** | `string` | Yes | Mime type of associated media (e.g. `"video/mp4"`). | 1.1 |
| **url** | `uri` | Yes | URL to media. Supports data URI in version 1.2+ | 1.1 |
<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->

## Rendering
